H0.text: What is the name of the semi-fluid, clarified butter used in Indian cookery. **Smen**

H1.text: What is the name of the semi-fluid, clarified butter used in Indian cookery. **Beurre Noisette**

H2.text: What is the name of the semi-fluid, clarified butter used in Indian cookery. **Makhan**

H3.text: What is the name of the semi-fluid, clarified butter used in Indian cookery. Ghee
